Model Wrapping#

Modeva enables the seamless integration of diverse predictive models by wrapping them into Modeva workflows, such as Sklearn-style or other arbitrary models. Modeva provides a ModelZoo class that allows users to register and manage models in a centralized manner. This seciton also covers model tuning via hyperparameter optimization.
